about.title: About Sharkfood
content: I started Sharkfood as a software development shop back in 2010.
Over the years, I've developed many interesting projects, some are publicly known, others are top secret :)
I've built retail apps, instant messaging using the Signal end-to-end encryption protocol, and more.
Whether it's iOS, Android, Web Frontend/Backend, or custom C++ projects, I deliver on time and on budget.
I'm based in Berlin.
Check out my Linkedin, Github and Stackoverflow for more info.

content.content: Over the years, I've developed many interesting projects, some are publicly known, others are top secret :)

fooducate.title: Fooducate
content: Fooducate - Eat a little better.
I've been working on Fooducate from 2010-2022, until it was sold to Maple Media.
Over the years Fooducate had won awards, and was a constant member of the top 10 apps in the Food & Health category, and was even presented in Apple ads for the iPhone.
Fooducate is available only in the US AppStore.
iOS, C++, Swift, Objective C

instant-talk.title: Instant Talk
content: Instant Talk
Push To Talk client for the IPRS system.
Built for Mobile Tornado, I started this project and imported code from legacy systems such as BREW and Symbian to iOS.
Implemented a realtime Push To Talk system with a sub second call setup, and an instant messenger.
iOS, C/C++, Objective C

iprs-firewall.title: IPRS Firewall
content: IPRS Gateway is a data packet filtering process for Linux, built for Mobile Tornado.
Built as an IP router, the gateway uses Linux packet filtering for protecting agains attacks on the MT IPRS server.
It inspects packets, makes sure the packets are valid, and also maintains statistics to protect agains DoS attacks.
It also applies in-place heuristics to help reject messages, altering the packets so they would be re-routed to the sender as a 'denied' response.
Linux, C++, Net filtering, IP Gateway, UDP
iOS, C/C++, Objective C

secret.title: Top Secret
content: A new instant messenger with a unique set of features.
Designed and built this new project from scratch.
Implemented the Signal end to end encryption protocol.
iOS/Android/Web/Backend C/C++,Swift,Flutter,Typescript/NodeJS,PostgreSQL,AWS

clalit.title: Clalit Child Development
content: Clalit Child Development ages 0-2
Built for the largest HMO in Israel, Clalit health services.
The app tracked the development of children ages 0-2, using the steps described by Clalit.
This project is a joint effort with Yaniv Fridman, and is our unique invention sold to Clalit.
iOS/Android, Objective C/Java
